description_localized.en:
6 Twin Beds
Features a private balcony

Layout - 3 bedrooms, living room, and dining area
Internet - Free WiFi
Food & Drink - Kitchen
Bathroom - Private bathroom and shower
Practical - Desk; cribs/infant beds available on request
Need to Know - Limited housekeeping
Non-Smoking
